ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Congratz Slyde!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ack BP on your first trip to Hate!? I ve gone every Wednesday night on E ci for the last 3 months and haven t seen a single BP :-( -Faras ... From: Rebecca
ygData.messageBody:
Ack BP on your first trip to Hate!?

I've gone every Wednesday night on E'ci for the last 3 months and haven't
seen a single BP :-(

-Faras

-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2001 9:49 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Congratz Slyde!


Great to hear, Slyde! I've helped with Maestro twice and he had nothing for
the bards both times, the cheapskate. Good to hear he makes up for it on
occasion. I have boots and BP from my first trip to Hate. I was recently
congratulated on being 'colorful' by a friend: Hate boots and BP,
lambent/Hero bracer, hammerhead helm, Ry Gor legs, lambent gloves, azure
sleeves.
I heard Darkfox in HS last night. We were in South tower.

Song of twilight is one of my current favorites. We were in a room last
night that had a sloping floor and things would get pushed down the ramp
during melee that broke the casters' line of sight casts. Getting the mage
pet to disengage takes too long, so I'd use SoT to drag them back up, or
drag them out of doorways. It's really handy to be able to move a mob
sometimes.

Brilinnia Ban'sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
